alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 12:30PM MST until February 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern portions of Hidalgo county in the New Mexico Bootheel. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be east of elevated terrain and along ridgelines. Winds will gradually subside Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
